name: cloudformation-js-yaml-schema
description: Schema to ignore CloudFormation YAML local tags while parsing or dumping

scripts.sort-tags.json: command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 &&(jq -S '' tags.json )>tags.sorted.json&&mv tags.sorted.json tags.json || { echo 'jq is not install or not in $PATH' >&2; exit 0; }
